metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11813 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
libjpeg 9c has a large loop because read_pixel in rdtarga.c mishandles EOF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libjpeg-turbo-test - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libjpeg-turbo8 - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libturbojpeg - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

libjpeg-progs - 1:9d-1
libjpeg9 - 1:9d-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.6-0ubuntu2').
libjpeg6b package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
libjpeg9 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9d-1').
